channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-25753] KafkaTableITCase.testStartFromGroupOffsetsLatest fails on AZP
item.description:
The test KafkaTableITCase.testStartFromGroupOffsetsLatest fails on AZP with

https://dev.azure.com/apache-flink/apache-flink/_build/results?buildId=29867&view=logs&j=c5f0071e-1851-543e-9a45-9ac140befc32&t=15a22db7-8faa-5b34-3920-d33c9f0ca23c&l=35254

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: ruanhang1993 can you have a look at this because it seems to be caused by the new feature you have added?
Yes, I will take a look at this error.

This test contains 3 phases:

  1. insert data
  2. flink job starts to read and set to latest offsets
  3. add new data and check

All these three phases are submitted by `executeSql`.

But it seems like the third phase will finish before the set to latest offsets operation in the second phase. It causes that the new data will not be read. 

So I need add some sleep time before adding new data. I have tried to use `CommonTestUtils.waitForAllTaskRunning`, but it does not work.

https://dev.azure.com/apache-flink/apache-flink/_build/results?buildId=30261&view=logs&j=1fc6e7bf-633c-5081-c32a-9dea24b05730&t=576aba0a-d787-51b6-6a92-cf233f360582

https://dev.azure.com/apache-flink/apache-flink/_build/results?buildId=30261&view=logs&j=c5612577-f1f7-5977-6ff6-7432788526f7&t=ffa8837a-b445-534e-cdf4-db364cf8235d&l=35569
Hi ruanhang1993 ~ If possible we'd better not use sleep since it could not ensure the order of events happen~ Is it possible to use some-kind of in-memory coordination if possible?

Thanks, gaoyunhaii ~ Using sleep is not a good idea. I have changed this code to stay watching the committed offset in the kafka broker. And we should add new data after all the offset committed to the kafka.

Very thanks ruanhang1993 for the update!

https://dev.azure.com/apache-flink/apache-flink/_build/results?buildId=30347&view=logs&j=c5f0071e-1851-543e-9a45-9ac140befc32&t=15a22db7-8faa-5b34-3920-d33c9f0ca23c&l=35616
